name: Break Space: Out of Bounds
description:
A CLASSIC ARCADE WITH A DIFFERENT THEME

Break Space Out of Bounds is a game that will bring 80's nostalgia to today's modernity! Control a spaceship and prevent the Terran nation from being enslaved by the Marthians. Will you be able to defend the land of the marthians without being destroyed before or after?

MINIMUM START
Start with the basic horizontal movement commands and then use the vertical directional pad to use some items.



Go alone in a travel in the Universe and eliminate your enemie like a lone wolf.
Complete different combinations of missions and difficulties!



Explore the story of five soldiers never seen before and it's your responsibility to save them.
Complete the Story in 25 levels.




Prove to your friend that you are better prepared then him for war!
Still have multiplayer mode to play with your teammates on Remote Play Together!


EASILY EXTENDABLE
Since most of the Break Space Out of Bounds data is loaded from simple JSON files and Spritesheets, when the game starts, it is extremely extensible and fast.

FEATURES
- Types of color for spaceship.
- Some types of Items to help you along the journey and to play on multiplayer.
